about.description:
The modeller emg3d is a multigrid solver for 3D EM diffusion with tri-axial
electrical anisotropy. The matrix-free solver can be used as main solver or
as preconditioner for Krylov subspace methods, and the governing equations
are discretized on a staggered Yee grid.
about.summary: A multigrid solver for 3D electromagnetic diffusion.

name: emg3d
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "emg3d" %}
{% set version = "0.9.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9a85e4782c5ef9f93ddbca7218537e50e6bd928a24ff8373915f61990e095335

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  preserve_egg_dir: True

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.7
    - setuptools_scm
  run:
    - empymod
    - numba >=0.40.0
    - numpy >=1.15.0
    - python >=3.7
    - scipy >=1.1.0

test:
  imports:
    - emg3d

about:
  home: https://empymod.github.io
  license: "Apache Software"
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "A multigrid solver for 3D electromagnetic diffusion."
  description: |
    The modeller emg3d is a multigrid solver for 3D EM diffusion with tri-axial
    electrical anisotropy. The matrix-free solver can be used as main solver or
    as preconditioner for Krylov subspace methods, and the governing equations
    are discretized on a staggered Yee grid.
  doc_url: https://emg3d.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/empymod/emg3d

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - prisae
